item.title: How to Prepare for the Quantum Workforce Series
item.description: Information Our advisor Florian Carle is hosting a cool professional development panel about working in quantum startups on Oct 29 at 4 pm! See details below. More information: https://quantuminstitute.yale.edu/resources/how-join-quantum-workforce Link to register: https://yale.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_iW2BwsRWS4KSZ4C3ugVO-w Other events that might be interesting! Public Talk - Sean Carroll: The Many Worlds of Quantum Mechanics - Tuesday, November 2, 2021 - 5:00pm https://quantuminstitute.yale.edu/event/public-talk-sean-carroll-many-worlds-quantum-mechanics How to Join the Quantum Workforce? â€“ Prepare for Industry - Friday, December 10, 2021 - 4:00pm https://quantuminstitute.

item.title: Speaker Series (Spring 2021)
item.description: Here is a summary and schedule of the YuQC Speaker Series. Information & Recordings Check out this Youtube playlist of all past talk recordings!! Please click here (yale.edu account required) to access zoom links, meeting passwords, and, eventually, recordings for this speaker series. Dr. Zlatko Minev To catch and reverse a quantum jump mid-flight April 21, 7:00PM-8:00PM ET Dr. Minev is a scientist with an applied experimental and theoretical background, focused on quantum computing and fundamental physics.
